lexUnit.name: disturbing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: bringing about anxiety and fear

sentence.text: I found this a deeply disturbing work , an impression which was further intensified upon repeat hearings .
The id , according to Freud , is uncontainable throughout the night , and instinctual pressure periodically forces unacceptable and deeply disturbing ideas into consciousness .

A closer look at the figures , however , reveals some more disturbing evidence .

The most disturbing fact about business intelligence is that the information obtained is rarely used for actual decision making … .
The most disturbing threat to our freedom and security is the growing disrespect for the rule of law .

The blue eyes burning into hers were carrying a very disturbing message , and Kate wriggled in delight .
However , the disappearance of the Soviet Union will have very disturbing consequences .
That 's extremely disturbing .

This may be disturbing for the client who should be forewarned .
Midge 's refusal to accept the death of her son created an atmosphere in the house that was more disturbing than overt grief .
It 's quite disturbing .

Use white lights rather than coloured ones , which generally create disturbing colour effects with foliage and flowers .

This disturbing critique of male values questioned the motives behind scientific achievements .

On this stormy winter 's night , alone in the darkness of the Cathedral , I found myself falling prey to a host of disturbing thoughts .
That disturbing thought made me even more glad to have dressed soberly and inconspicuously .
A disturbing thought struck Melissa .
Another disturbing trend is the drift of large regional companies out of brewing .
Two particularly disturbing trends had emerged .
I began to see a pattern to these puzzling events , a distinct and disturbing trend .
I became vividly aware of this disturbing phenomenon while I was sitting deep in thought on Hammersmith Bridge this afternoon .
I certainly do n't have feelings for this girl who I hardly know , I just have these really disturbing desires .

She was held by the disturbing events of the night , and here was her chance to wait out a better understanding of them on the spot .

I increasingly found these quite disturbing .
Today , however , they seemed disturbing .
She might secretly find this tall , elegant man extremely disturbing , but she was n't prepared to let him guess that fact .
